metadata.Title: CVE-2017-2620 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Quick emulator (QEMU) before 2.8 built with the Cirrus CLGD 54xx VGAEmulator support is vulnerable to an out-of-bounds access issue. The issuecould occur while copying VGA data in cirrus_bitblt_cputovideo. Aprivileged user inside guest could use this flaw to crash the QEMU processOR potentially execute arbitrary code on host with privileges of the QEMUprocess.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-2620` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

qemu - 1:2.5+dfsg-5ubuntu10.11
qemu-block-extra - 1:2.5+dfsg-5ubuntu10.11
qemu-guest-agent - 1:2.5+dfsg-5ubuntu10.11
